nodes.text: The Republic Strategic Command was a strategic command of the Galactic Republic. Ardinondu Dipolus Daeruun consulted with the command regarding whether or not to enlist the Alliance Commander in the Third Galactic War.

The Republic Strategic Command is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne by Ardinondu Dipolus Daeruun in the Republic storyline. If the player sided with the Sith Empire during the events on Iokath, the Command will be reluctant to recruit the Commander, but Daeruun will vouch for them. However, if the player sided with the Republic, the Command unanimously agreed to involve the Commander in future Republic campaigns.
